permissions.title: Missing permissions!
alert: Hi {{member}}, unfortunately I cannot reply to you because I don't have the `Send Messages` permission on this guild. Please contact someone to grant me this permission, thank you. ‚ù§Ô∏è

mentions.client: Hey {{author}}, I'm **{{name}}** and my prefix on that server is: **`{{prefix}}`**, want to know my commands? Use `{{prefix}}help`!

cooldown.reply: Calm down my boss! You must wait `{{time}} second(s)` before using the `{{command}}` command again.

owner.reply: Only the `{{client}} developer` can use this command.

interaction: There was an error running this application, I have already contacted my developer, please try again later.
message: There was an error running this command, I already contacted my developer, please try again later.
I couldn't find any command named: `{{command}}`.
Hmmm, this doesn't look like an existing command to me, didn't you mean: `{{command}}`? Use `{{prefix}}help` to see my list of commands.

embed.title: {{client}} it's on maintenance.
embed.description: I'm currently undergoing maintenance, please try again later.

embed.title: {{command}} it's on maintenance!
embed.description: The command **`{{command}}`** is currently under maintenance.

blacklist.user: {{user}}, you cannot use my commands at the moment, you are on my `blacklist`.

title: Args style:
Args type:
values:
`text` - Any text.
`number` - An integer number.
`user` - Mention or ID of an user.

voted.title: Thanks for voting!
voted.description:
Thank you for voting for me {{user}}, your vote is very important for other users to see that I am a useful bot and consequently increasing my visibility to new users.

Each time you vote you can win up to `R$5,000`, turn on notifications and stay tuned whenever you can vote again!

You now have {{votes}} votes and as a reward you have earned **{{money}}** (R$ {{abbrevMoney}})
